name: Payback 2015
description:
A game about wrestling, love, people being jerks, and a 16-bit John Cena theme!

Do you love playing fan games? Do you kinda wish you could tell Superstars to shut up? Then, oh boy, do I have a thing I made for you.

You play as a new manager who just got transferred over to WWE. You're skilled at your job, but very new to the world of wrestling. Your temporary boss, Triple H, has assigned you to overview the Fatal Fourway at the Payback Pay-Per-View this weekend! Will you be able to handle your job, make these wrestlers happy, and maybe also find love? Or will you fail miserably and be fired??

TONS OF COOL FEATURES SUCH AS:

  • Choose between Seth Rollins, Randy Orton, Dean Ambrose, and Roman Reigns!
  • 16 different endings!
  • Gender neutral player character!
  • A ton of Easter eggs!
  • Compatible with PC, Mac, and Linux!
  • Completely free to play!

Made with ren'py, a full credits .txt can be found in your game folder, with links to the music credits!

If you play the game and would like to liveblog it, tag it with #payback2015 because I'd love to see it!

Originally released on Tumblr in April 2016
